{"id":723871972,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1655404108,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"191 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/723871972/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"46.3 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} height\n * @return {number}\n */\n\n//https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8UjlJZsHBw\nvar trap = function(height) {\n    let res = 0;\n    let len = height.length;\n    let maxLeft = [], maxRight = [];\n    \n    maxLeft[0] = height[0];\n    maxRight[len - 1] = height[len - 1];\n    \n    for (let i = 1; i < len; i ++) {\n        maxLeft[i] = Math.max(height[i], maxLeft[i - 1]);\n    }\n    \n    for (let i = len - 2; i >= 0; i--) {\n        maxRight[i] = Math.max(height[i], maxRight[i + 1]);\n    }\n    for (let i = 1; i < len; i++) {\n        let waterLevel = Math.min(maxLeft[i], maxRight[i])\n        res += waterLevel - height[i];\n    }\n    return res;\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
